reviews.text: We were in Puerto Varas for a meeting that took place at the Hotel Patagonico and were very pleasantly surprised at how charming and beautiful the hotel was. The rooms were well appointed. If at all possible, get a room with a view of one of the impressive snow-capped volcanic peaks. The hotel has beautiful landscaping, gardens you can walk through, lovely terraces to relax in. Off the lobbly is a large room filled with wonderful couches and chairs in many separate seating areas. The hotel restaurant if very nice -- an excellent breakfast buffet with Chilean and American dishes. Food at dinner was good, but nothing to rave about. The bar was a lot of fun at night and also serves light meals. The staff is helpful, but be aware that many of them speak little or no English, although they will always try to find a colleague who does if communications prove difficult.
reviews.title: Charming surprise

reviews.text: The room was large and comfortable with a gorgeous little garden outside the window - we were on the second floor. The bathroom was quite large too. Also, the windows could be opened for fresh air, which was a bonus for me.
